description: Delete a shift set time card constraint.
permissions: User must be authorized to create the constrained record (RateAgreement or Tender); create/update/destroy permission for a constraint delegates to the constrained record policy.
side_effects: Deletes the shift set time card constraint; deletes its shift_scope if present; deletion is blocked if the constraint has children.
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required. --confirm is required to delete.

flags.name: --confirm
flags.validation: Must be set to true to proceed.
